tswitem.name: Additive Restoration Module
tswitem.tooltip:
Additive Restoration Module
AEGIS-Module (QL 2)
Bind when pickup
Whenever you heal an ally whose AEGIS shield type matches your AEGIS weapon type, you have a 20% chance to apply a beneficial effect which restores 22 / 34 AEGIS strength to that target's current shield every second for 4 seconds.
